metadata.title: CVE-2020-10251 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In ImageMagick 7.0.9, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists within theReadHEICImageByID function in coders\heic.c. It can be triggered via animage with a width or height value that exceeds the actual size of theimage.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
